duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead all design engineering for furniture, packaging, and regulatory aspects of the business.
Manage NPD/NPI projects and collaborate with internal teams and component suppliers.
Create and validate soft and hard prototypes, with a focus on solid wood construction best practices.
Utilize PLM/ERP for REV control and production implementation.
Develop detailed SolidWorks assemblies with 2D/3D spec packages for production.
Support sales, customer service, purchasing, and production with product knowledge and design expertise.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or Product Development (Master's preferred)
